reviewText: I got this dvd for my mom since i know she loves her "bori" as she refers to him. She is constantly working out with this dvd instead of her Gillian Michaels dvd and loves the results she has gotten. I guess these workouts are fun and effective especially for Spanish speakers who barely have any fitness celebrities.

This is an awsome dvd and its 1hr. and 40 min. of excercise. It has giving me great results! It is very intense work out and Carlos Pia explains in detail what to do and what not to do to avoid getting injured. I do recomend it to any one!
